allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Simplify app architecture and switch to PostgreSQL database

- Remove 3D forklift interactive features and test code from LessonDetail page
- Switch rendering mode to InteractiveServer for lesson detail
- Update database provider from SQLite to PostgreSQL in configuration
- Simplify Program.cs startup code by removing seed data logic
- Update Blazor script from blazor.server.js to blazor.web.js
- Remove content formatting functions in favor of direct content rendering
- Add new pages: Add3DContent.razor and EditLessonContent.razor
- Disable browser auto-launch in development settings
- Add project documentation files and workspace configuration
